lines.text: Enter REGAN and OSWALD

lines.speaker: regan
lines.text: But are my brothers powers set forth

lines.speaker: oswald
lines.text: Ay, madam.

lines.speaker: regan
lines.text: Himself in person there

lines.speaker: oswald
lines.text: Madam, with much ado: Your sister is the better soldier.

lines.speaker: regan
lines.text: Lord Edmund spake not with your lord at home

lines.speaker: oswald
lines.text: No, madam.

lines.speaker: regan
lines.text: What might import my sisters letter to him

lines.speaker: oswald
lines.text: I know not, lady.

lines.speaker: regan
lines.text: Faith, he is posted hence on serious matter. It was great ignorance, Gloucesters eyes being out, To let him live: where he arrives he moves All hearts against us: Edmund, I think, is gone, In pity of his misery, to dispatch His nighted life: moreover, to descry The strength o the enemy.

lines.speaker: oswald
lines.text: I must needs after him, madam, with my letter.

lines.speaker: regan
lines.text: Our troops set forth tomorrow: stay with us The ways are dangerous.

lines.speaker: oswald
lines.text: I may not, madam: My lady charged my duty in this business.

lines.speaker: regan
lines.text: Why should she write to Edmund Might not you Transport her purposes by word Belike, SomethingI know not what: Ill love thee much, Let me unseal the letter.

lines.speaker: oswald
lines.text: Madam, I had rather

lines.speaker: regan
lines.text: I know your lady does not love her husband I am sure of that: and at her late being here She gave strange oeillades and most speaking looks To noble Edmund. I know you are of her bosom.

lines.speaker: oswald
lines.text: I, madam

lines.speaker: regan
lines.text: I speak in understanding you are I knowt: Therefore I do advise you, take this note: My lord is dead Edmund and I have talkd And more convenient is he for my hand Than for your ladys: you may gather more. If you do find him, pray you, give him this And when your mistress hears thus much from you, I pray, desire her call her wisdom to her. So, fare you well. If you do chance to hear of that blind traitor, Preferment falls on him that cuts him off.

lines.speaker: oswald
lines.text: Would I could meet him, madam! I should show What party I do follow.

lines.speaker: regan
lines.text: Fare thee well.
Exeunt
